attributes.sig: Apply approximately 1 gram of clotrimazole 1% cream to the affected area twice daily for 14 days. Ensure the area is clean and dry before application. Do not cover the treated area with a bandage unless directed by a healthcare provider.
attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense three 12-gram tubes to cover the 14-day treatment period.

parameters.sig: Apply the cream on the affected area.
parameters.comment: Prescribed for treating fungal skin infections.
